For example: "New students start accessing course resources at [specific link], where you find all necessary modules and videos for a thorough understanding of our curriculum."

You could address the submission method by instructing learners to include social media links in designated sections but emphasize they should submit up to seven distinct URLs per homework form submissions, as this will proportionately affect their extra credit scores.
